charterlang.title: The values that make our coliving thrive
charterlang.subtitle: This charter is designed to ensure a harmonious and respectful coliving experience for everyone.

respect.title: Respect & kindness
respect.description: Living together starts with mutual respect.
respect.note: Each resident contributes to a warm atmosphere.
